title: Civil society coalition launches campaign calling for Direct-to-Cell satellite connectivity amid Iran’s internet shutdowns
content: Iran’s government-imposed internet shutdown amid nationwide protests highlights the urgent need for crisis-ready connectivity. With millions cut off from the rest of the world, we’re calling on technology companies and policymakers to urgently prioritize humanitarian internet access for civilians in the deployment of the Direct-to-Cell (D2C) satellite technologies. Humanitarian applications embedded in D2C satellite connectivity regulatory and operational frameworks can offer a lifeline to civil...
